basic.description:
A detailed study of selected plays from French theatre since 1945. Visual presentations. Semiotic approach. Cocteau, Duras, Beckett, Ionesco, Sarraute, Sartre, Koltès. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 417/3.0. 
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre depuis 1945

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN305; FREN417.
